topic.title: [My program] An alternative to JSFiddle/CodePen
topic.body:
[CodeR](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CodEr7T9xNXSPcwbsvf5fHTqsixDMwDzL/). It has transpiler support: SASS, LESS, CoffeeScript, LiveScript, Babel and libraries: Angular, jQuery, lodash, etc. Please check if it works.

Note that it can hang on loading as it is around 8MB of scripts.

1_1JdoX9KdJeRVjN9zvK8N9C5jybEHzZe8n.body: So that's something like StackOverflow? ZeroNet is becoming better...
BTW, @tristank , you should probably add this post to `sticked` in `content.json`.
